messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Attention crew of space station 13, we are lifting our narcotic laws to allow a new source of income. We are sending a centcom agent, if you bring him meth or any other type of drug you will be rewarded. 

-Intern Steve

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Attention crew of space station 13, since the engine has not been started we are detecting mass power-loss stationwide. As such we will consider calling the shuttle, if you want the shuttle to be called, just say something over comms.

-Intern Ross

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Library.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Higher Dimensional Affairs

An acausal dimensional event has been detected in your sector. Event has been flagged EXTINCTION-CLASS. Directing all available assets toward simulating solutions. SOLUTION ETA: 60 SECONDS.
